reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my sister who LOVES the Saddle Club. She loved it and for some reason the movie sucked me in too. I mean it's kind of an interesting show to begin with and what girl didn't dream of owning her own pony when she was little? The acting is not the most awesome but then again it's a kid's show:)
summary: What is it about the Saddle Club?
Title: Saddle Club - Horse Crazy - The New Movie

reviewText: glad the movies still are out so my girls can watch them..like i did as a younger girl. the movie was here fast or on time, nicely packaged.  played well. thank you
Title: Saddle Club - Horse Crazy - The New Movie

reviewText: im horse crazy and i owned a lot of saddleclub books as a kid but this travesty (mostly the tv show but the movie too) butchered them.
Title: Saddle Club - Horse Crazy - The New Movie

reviewText: Good series about children at a riding school. It does have a "mean" girl, but the good girls always solve their problem, and take good care of their horses.
Title: Saddle Club - Horse Crazy - The New Movie

reviewText: My 12 and 6 year old grand kids love this DVD and have spent many hours watching it.  It is a great move for a great price
Title: Saddle Club - Horse Crazy - The New Movie
